data: `minecraft:behavior.pet_sleep_with_owner` allows an entity to sleep on a bed shared with its sleeping owner.
`minecraft:behavior.pet_sleep_with_owner` requires a `player` to be tagged as the entity's owner, via taming or console command.

data.Name: goal_radius
data.Description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot

data.Name: search_height
data.Description: Height in blocks from the owner the pet can be to sleep with owner.

data.Name: search_range
data.Description: The range that the mob will search for a treasure chest within a ruin or shipwreck to move towards.

data.Name: speed_multiplier
data.Description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
